name: Creamy Three-Cheese Artichoke Dip
description: [Photograph: Jennifer Olvera] Artichoke dip is popular for good reason: it's a bubbly, cheesy crowd-pleaser. Note: Leftovers are tasty tucked into skin-on, bone-in chicken breasts. Just slice chicken horizontally down the center until you can open it like a book....
recipeIngredient: 2 (14-ounce) cans artichoke hearts packed in water, drained and chopped
Pita, warmed and cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust the oven rack to the middle position and preheat oven to 375°F. Beat cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, vinegar, onion powder, paprika and salt in a large bowl using a hand-mixer set to medium speed until fluffy and thoroughly combined, about 2 minutes.
Using a wooden spoon, fold in Parmesan, Romano, artichokes and garlic. Spray a 9” x 13” baking pan with cooking spray and spread mixture evenly in pan. Sprinkle with mozzarella.
Place in oven and bake until heated through, bubbly and lightly browned, 30-35 minutes. Serve immediately with pita for dipping.
